H0.text: A balance is the tool that should be used to measure the stem length of a plant.

H1.text: A metric ruler should be used to measure the stem length of a plant.

H2.text: A graduated cylinder is the tool that should be used to measure the stem length of a plant.

H3.text: A thermometer is the tool that should be used to measure the stem length of a plant.

A4.text: a ruler, sometimes called a rule, scale, line gauge, or metre/meter stick, is an instrument used to make length measurements
